title: A website that creates build guides based on aggregate games throughout high elo

embed.description: Champion.gg provides League of Legends champion statistics, builds, runes, masteries, skill orders and counters by role - including Win Rate, Ban Rate, Play Rate and much more!

body:
If you haven't heard about it yet, here you go.

Really good website to build a champ you're not 100% sure on or to learn the new fotm.
